title: STEM-Based Social Problem-Solving Competency Enhancement Through Collaborative Problem Solving

context.prior_knowledge: Grasp of fundamental STEM concepts and experience with online learning platforms
context.additional_context: Conducted in a smartphone-centric limited technological environment, focusing on cultivating STEM-based problem-solving competencies for social issues faced by practitioners in the workplace.

learning_goals: Learners can design and execute team-based STEM projects using the CPS (Collaborative Problem Solving) framework.
Learners can perform effective communication in asynchronous environments using digital collaboration tools.
Learners can holistically apply CPS elements (task regulation, social interaction, knowledge construction) to address social issues.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
